title: 74/360/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 June 1974 exempting the United Kingdom from applying to certain species the Council Directive of 30 June 1969 on the marketing of seed of oil and fibre plants (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 June 1974  exempting the United Kingdom from applying to certain species the Council Directive of 30 June 1969 on the marketing of seed of oil and fibre plants  (Only the English text is authentic)  (74/360/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 June 1974.
For the Commission
The President
François-Xavier ORTOLI  (1)OJ No L 169, 10.7.1969, p. 3. (2)OJ No L 356, 27.12.1973, p. 79.
